content: in white starting point is paw base make 2 round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 single_crochet bbl st 3 single_crochet 2 6 round 3 6 single_crochet 6 change to your orange yarn in last single_crochet fasten_off white round 4-5 2 rounds single_crochet 6 6 lightly stuff paws slp-st in beginning single_crochet fasten of leaving a long tail for later sewing ears worked in orange make 2 when making the slip-st leave a long tail it will be used for sewing row 1 chain 5 5 row 2 starting in the second chain from hook single_crochet 4 turn 4 row 3 chain 1 decrease 2 turn 2 teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry fasten_off and thread the end through the first decrease of that round pull halfway through then insert needle through loop and pull tight this creates a triangle see pictures weave in the ending thread leaving the beginning thread for sewing to the body teddy cat assembly tail pin the tail to the center of the rump you can either sew the tail vertically or horizontally to the rump i sewed it horizontally when happy with the placement sew into place ears pin the ears cocked slightly forward about one row below the magic_ring and about 2 row back from the face bobble stitches when happy with the placement sew whip-stitch style into place teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry feet embroider a pink paw pad and nails on each foot back feet pin the back feet slightly underneath the body facing out the heel of the foot should be just touching the last round of the body when happy with the placement sew into place teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry front feet pin the front feet facing forward between the neck area and back two paws make sure the kitten sits well before sewing when happy with position sew into place whip-stitch style nose in pink embroider nose between the face bobble stitches i hope you ve enjoyed making your kitten if you have any questions or comments please message me on ravelry thank you teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry
